se.kth.inda.indaprojekt

Class GameSurfaceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • se.kth.inda.indaprojekt.GameSurfaceView

  • public class GameSurfaceView
extends SurfaceView
    This class renders a running GameEngine to the screen in an efficient manner. Rendering starts when a GameEngine is supplied to the setGameEngine method.
    Author:
    Mattias

      • GameSurfaceView

        public GameSurfaceView(Context context,
               AttributeSet attr)

    • Method Detail

      • setGameEngine

        public void setGameEngine(GameEngine e)
        Set the GameEngine to be rendered. The engine MUST NOT be running, and should not have any level set.
        Parameters:
        e - The engine to render.

      • surfaceChanged

        public void surfaceChanged(SurfaceHolder holder,
                  int format,
                  int width,
                  int height)

      • surfaceCreated

        public void surfaceCreated(SurfaceHolder holder)

      • surfaceDestroyed

        public void surfaceDestroyed(SurfaceHolder holder)

      • updateSurfaceView

        public void updateSurfaceView()
        Force redraw of the canvas. This method is thread safe.

      • drawStuff

        public void drawStuff(Canvas canvas)
        Draw all the objects in the engine to the supplied canvas. Make sure that the canvas is thread exclusive for the duration of this method.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas to draw to.
